alert.note: Alert for City of Hyder (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 9:44AM AKST until February 25 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW LASTING THROUGH SATURDAY... .Low pressure over the NE Gulf will remain in place through Friday while an associated front with embedded waves will move over the panhandle. Light snow is expected through the day, then a stronger wave along the front will cause rates to pick up in the late afternoon and evening. Some uncertainty remains regarding snow totals due to limited moisture in the central and northern inner channels. For most areas the greatest snowfall rates continue to be Friday evening through early Saturday morning while Yakutat may see snow ending earlier. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 11 to 14 inches. * WHERE...City of Hyder. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to be dry with greatest rates Friday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
